short_reason: Multiple high-sensitivity data sources (telecom, license plate, financial, travel) feeding into integrated systems.
Strong entity-resolution and cross-database linkability enabling persistent tracking across contexts.
Pattern-of-life analysis and risk scoring regularly used in enforcement and intelligence workflows.
Role-based access and audit logs exist but enforcement is inconsistent and exceptions are common.
Individuals have limited visibility and remedies for data exploitation; some case law and statutes provide partial avenues.
